name: Moles
description:
THESE GOSH DARN MOLES!! Find your way through a mole-infested golf course and uncover the mystery behind the chaos and your missing golf clubs. 

Programming by Ethan Siew

Art by Ethan Siew

Sfx & Music by Ethan Siew

This is a little project I decided to try and finish in the span of 3-4 months before heading back to school and it's my first ever game so any feedback is appreciated. Hope you enjoy!
